title: Customer Discovery Interview with a Caretaker of an Elderly Patient

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: Hello, I'm here to talk about the experiences I've had taking care of my elderly father.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: Thank you for coming in today. Can you tell me more about the challenges you face when managing visits to the healthcare system?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: One of the biggest issues is the long queues at the NFZ clinics. My father often can't stand for long periods.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: I see, that must be very difficult for both of you. How does he react during these long waits?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: He gets frustrated easily, especially when he doesn't understand what’s happening or what he needs to do next.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: That sounds challenging. How do you manage those situations when he becomes angry?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: I try to remain calm and reassure him, but it can be tough. Sometimes he just doesn't want to cooperate anymore.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: Have you found any strategies or support that help during these visits?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: Not really. I often feel overwhelmed and wish there were more resources available to assist elderly patients like him.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: Is it difficult for you to navigate the system as well, in finding the right department or person?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: Yes, very much so. Sometimes we go to the wrong room and then have to start all over again.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: That sounds frustrating. How does this impact his healthcare access?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: It makes it harder for him to get the help he needs regularly. Sometimes we just give up altogether.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: What improvements do you think could be made to help you and others in similar situations?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: Having someone to assist with navigation would be helpful, maybe a dedicated caretaker for elderly patients.

dialogue.speaker: CUSTOMER_SERVICE
dialogue.content: That’s a great suggestion. Would you be open to exploring solutions that could provide that support?

dialogue.speaker: CLIENT
dialogue.content: Absolutely. Anything that makes it easier for us would be welcome.
